item.title: About Our Documentation
item.description: DefectDojo Inc. and open-source contributors maintain this documentation to support both the Community and Pro editions of DefectDojo. What is DefectDojo?

item.title: ‚òëÔ∏è New User Checklist

item.title: Pro Features List
item.description: DefectDojo Pro comes with many additional features. Here is list of those features, along with links to documentation to see them in action:

item.title: Contact DefectDojo Support
item.description: Need help with DefectDojo? Here are some ways to get assistance. DefectDojo Pro Support DefectDojo Pro subscriptions come with full support from the DefectDojo Inc team during the initial trial period and beyond.

item.title: üé® Beta UI Features
item.description: Note: The Beta UI and associated features are only available in DefectDojo Pro. In late 2023, DefectDojo Inc. released a new UI for DefectDojo Pro, which has since been in Beta for Pro customers to test and experiment with.

item.title: Request a DefectDojo Pro Trial
item.description: If your team requires an on-premise DefectDojo installation, please connect with our Sales team by emailing -> info at defectdojo dot com .
